title: 110_hr5617
content: The Act titled "Political Intelligence Disclosure Act" requires disclosure of political intelligence activities under the Lobbying Disclosure Act. The Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 is amended to include definitions for "political intelligence activities," which encompass contacts, preparation, research, and coordination related to political intelligence. The Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 is amended to include definitions for "political intelligence activities," which involve communication with government officials for analyzing securities or commodities markets and informing investment decisions. The Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 is amended to include definitions for "political intelligence activities," which involve communication with government officials regarding Federal rules, regulations, programs, policies, and contracts. The term "political intelligence contact" excludes communications made by or to the media for news dissemination. The term "political intelligence firm" is also defined. The Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 is amended to define "political intelligence firm" as an entity with political intelligence consultants serving clients. A "political intelligence consultant" is an individual providing political intelligence contacts for compensation. Additionally, a registration requirement is added for political intelligence consultants. The Lobbying Disclosure Act of 1995 is amended to include political intelligence consultants and firms, expanding the definition of lobbyists to include consultants. The amendment also adds a registration requirement for political intelligence consultants. The amendment also adds a registration requirement for political intelligence consultants, specifying their activities in subsection (b).
